HiddenText.Name: When will I hear back from BYU-Idaho about my application status?
HiddenText.OpenningText: When will I hear back from BYU-Idaho about my application status?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Most of the courses are open on a continual basis as interest lists. Applicants will only be notified if their status changes, such as dismissal from the process or invitation to proceed. Applications on the interest list will expire two years after submission, at which time candidates would need to reapply.
